# se-label



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                                                                                       | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `required` | `required` | When the label is part of a form field, this attribute defines if the input is required, adding a red asterisk next to the label. | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `value`    | `value`    | Defines the text that you want your label to display.                                                                             | `string`  | `undefined` |
